data.title: PS VR experiences
data.text:
YouTube

Explore YouTube’s vast and always growing collection of fully immersive 360-degree videos with the YouTube App for PS4 – now with PlayStation VR support.

YouTube

Explore YouTube’s vast and always growing collection of fully immersive 360-degree videos with the YouTube App for PS4 – now with PlayStation VR support.

NextVR

From the NBA Basketball to WWE and boxing matches, NextVR gives you access to world-class sports, music and entertainment events, as well as a growing selection of new original programming.

Littlstar VR Cinema

Plug into the leading VR entertainment network including 360 degree videos, movies and more from channels like ABC, Discovery, Nat Geo and Disney.

Lens

Stream a huge selection of inspiring, entertaining and visually breath-taking cinema from some of the most creative VR cinema producers.

Within

Discover the finest VR storytelling from a range of creators within a single app, from tales of imagination to incisive documentaries and much more.

Stranger Things: The VR Experience

Step into the hit Netflix series and feel the excitement of Stranger Things as you discover the shocking truth behind the disappearance of Will Byers.

Apollo 11 VR

Experience an incredible journey of space exploration in this unique interactive documentary, through the eyes of Apollo 11's crew.

The Last Guardian VR demo

Step inside the strange and mystical fantasy land of The Last Guardian and befriend a colossal feathered animal that needs your help.

Allumette

Journey to a city in the clouds in this VR movie of love and sacrifice, featuring a stirring soundtrack and hand-crafted visuals.

Kismet

Transport yourself to a magical realm using the mystic arts of tarot and astrology, brought to life in a beautiful handmade, Gothic style.

CTRL

Immerse yourself in the dark tale of a young e-sports gamer on the cusp of victory, as he discovers that there’s more than just prize money at stake…

Invasion!

Become part of an animated alien invasion movie starring Ethan Hawke that was shown at the Cannes, Tribeca and Toronto film festivals.

CoolpaintrVR

Create 3D virtual reality paintings with your PS Move motion controller or DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controller to create incredible artworks and share them with the world.

Cocos Shark Island

Travel 240 miles off the coast of Costa Rica and dive into the heart of the Pacific Ocean - a mecca for exotic fish and hungry sharks - in a stunning VR travel experience.

David Attenborough's First Life VR

Go on a journey of discovery to the Cambrian Oceans of 540 million years ago as David Attenborough reveals the dawn of life.

Atomic Ghost Fleet

Descend into the remote tropical waters around the Bikini Atoll and come face to face with an undisturbed marine world of extraordinary shipwrecks.

Chernobyl VR

Take a virtual tour inside the eerie, contaminated wastelands of Chernobyl and see the aftermath of one of history's greatest disasters.

The Martian Virtual Reality Experience

Explore the surface of Mars and try to survive in the red planet’s harsh environments.

Perfect

Escape reality and retreat into three relaxing virtual environments – the northern lights, a tropical beach and a mountain wilderness.

Virry VR Safari: Feel the Wild

Go on a virtual safari without leaving your home, getting up close and personal with rare and exotic wild animals from Northern Kenya in the BAFTA nominated Virry VR experience.

Virry VR Animals: Wild Encounters

Relax after a hard day, meet the exotic inhabitants of Kenya’s LEWA Wildlife Conservancy face to face and interact with them in a series of incredible video experiences filmed in 4K.

David Attenborough's Great Barrier Reef Dive VR

Explore the world’s largest coral reef alongside David Attenborough as you learn about how environmental changes affect the reef and its colourful inhabitants.

Spider-Man: Far from Home VR Experience

Transform into Spider-Man as you run, climb and web-sling freely through the streets in this PS VR experience. Use your advanced Spidey suit to navigate the city and make the most of your abilities as you defend the city from attack.

Spider-Man: Homecoming - Virtual Reality Experience

Suit up as Spider-Man and see through the eyes of the world’s favourite superhero - but learn quickly – The Vulture is on the loose and coming for you. Leap into a thrilling web-slinging VR experience, based on the 2017 movie Spider-Man Homecoming.

Justice League VR: The Complete Experience

Go behind the mask of some of DC Comic’s most iconic super heroes and master the incredible powers of Batman, Wonder Woman, Superman, The Flash, Aquaman and Cyborg in this cinematic VR experience, inspired by the blockbuster movie from Warner Bros.

Ghostbusters VR: Firehouse & Showdown bundle

Immerse yourself in the world of Ghostbusters as you hunt, blast and trap New York’s finest ghouls. Explore the Ghostbusters’ iconic base, step inside Ecto-1, assemble your Proton Wand - then fend off waves of ghosts before coming face-to-face with the iconic Stay-Puft Marshmellow Man.

Harmonix Music VR

See your favourite songs in incredible new ways as Harmonix Music VR conjures a unique visual projection to fit the rhythm.

Joshua Bell VR Experience

Enjoy a personal recital by award-winning violinist Joshua Bell and move freely around the 3D venue, soaking up the majesty of Air Studios’ stunning Lyndhurst Hall.

Philharmonia: The Virtual Orchestra

Go behind the scenes with one of the world’s greatest orchestras, the Philharmonia Orchestra of London, and experience the excitement and power of music from the inside.

Tom Grennan VR

Enjoy two performances by the acclaimed UK singer songwriter Tom Grennan in an intimate gig like no other.
